data.name: Refuge: Into the Unknown
data.detailed_description:
Add the game to your wishlist, it helps us a lot!

Introduction

In this 2D platform game you'll control George, a boy who decided to run away from his shelter where he was forced to work cleaning the chimneys of houses in the city. You must reach the end of the game by facing the challenges ahead. Don't forget not to get caught by your boss, who will chase you around the game to take you back to the shelter. Inspired by games like "LIMBO" and "INSIDE", you will need to reach the end of the map to complete the game.


You will be able to talk to some NPC's to better understand the story.

Game features

  • Explore 3 different map types.
  • If you die, you will be respawned at the last checkpoint.
  • What lurks in the darkness can kill you, so sometimes the best choice is to run or hide.
  • At times you will be able to use melee attack to face small enemies.
  • Solve small puzzles and obstacles along the way.

data.short_description: In the Industrial Age, forced to work cleaning chimneys from Birmingham's houses, a boy named George decides to run away from his shelter into the unknown hoping to find a better place to live. Help him getting away from the city and face the challenges that will be found in the journey.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Pentium G3250
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium G4560
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
